title: The Silver Metal Lover
description: Jane has it all. Clothes, money, and a beautiful home high above the city. But her safe little world is shattered the minute she meets Silver. Brilliant, witty, a gifted musician, kind, understanding, and gorgeous, Silver is the perfect man--except that he is a robot.Adapted and illustrated by Trina Robbins in cooperation with Tanith Lee.
author: Trina Robbins
